Frequently Asked Questions

Is this service really free?

Yes, MediaTools is completely free to use. There are no hidden fees, subscriptions, or login requirements.

Are TikTok videos watermark-free?

Yes! Our downloader automatically removes the TikTok watermark, giving you the clean original video.

Why can't I download some YouTube videos?

We cannot download copyrighted music videos or age-restricted content due to platform restrictions. Standard videos should work fine.

How do I get a video transcript?

Go to "Tools" > "Video Transcript" and paste a YouTube URL. Note: The video must have subtitles or auto-generated captions available.

Can I use this on my phone?

Absolutely! The site is fully mobile-responsive and works great on iOS and Android devices.
